title: Understand the Outcome Type
text: The method in question is used to predict a continuous outcome variable. Continuous variables can take any value within a range, such as height, weight, or temperature.

title: Identify the Method Type
text: The method used for predicting continuous outcomes is typically a type of regression analysis. Regression analysis helps in understanding the relationship between dependent and independent variables.

title: Differentiate Between Regression Types
text: Linear regression is used for predicting continuous outcomes, while logistic regression is used for predicting categorical outcomes. Clustering and decision trees are not primarily used for predicting continuous outcomes.

title: Select the Correct Term
text: The method that predicts a continuous outcome variable based on one or more predictor variables is called linear regression.
